Subjects: Virgin Mary, joys of; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: A hymn of the Five Joys — five 12-line stanzas (aabaabccbccb)

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Seinte marie leuedi bristmoder þov art of muchel
                    mist…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…for þe ioie þat euer is neweþov let me neuer
                    be fur lorn
CamTCC323.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.48-9.
Mätzner,  Edouard Adolf Ferdinand. 
             Altenglische Sprachproben, I: Poesie.
         Berlin: Wiedmann, 1867: 1.51-3.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 27-9.
